channel.title: Need help with compiler
channel.description:
when i run my compiler it says Compiling core... The system cannot find the path specified. Compiling loginserver... The system cannot find the path specified. Compiling packet handlers... The system cannot find the path specified. Compiling logging system... The system cannot find the path specified. Complete. The system cannot find the path specified. Complete. Press any key to continue . . .
and i have teamviewer and skype so add me on skype >alawwi_f76 my friend is good coder and he tried alot and he told me he cant help me with that so plz help my java jdk is 26
and this is what is in compiler when i do edit @echo off title Royal-scape echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling loginserver... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling logging system... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java echo Complete. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java echo Complete. pause

item.title: Need help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Edit your paths to your version of Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

Replace with exactly with this :p.

@echo off title Royal-scape echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling loginserver... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling logging system... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java echo Complete. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java echo Complete. pause Or you can try the above post first :p.

item.title: Need help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @Mattshi96 Mattshi96
item.description:
@Mattshi96 wrote:

@echo off
title Compiling…
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
try this and tell me what it says.

Read full topic
